Beyond the Mirror | Makeup Report 2025

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1917&user=10620> 	

Did you know that the GCC makeup market, worth USD 1.2bn in 2024, is set to grow 7% CAGR through 2028? 

Our Strategy & Intelligence team has released Beyond the Mirror: Trends & Opportunities in Makeup, a deep dive into the fast-growing GCC makeup market, uncovering trends, consumer shifts, and strategies reshaping the category.

Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1917&user=10620>

Exclusive Harry Potter Fragrance at The Deal

Experience the magical launch of the Harry Potter Fragrance in store at The Deal Outlet Mall: Customers who spend AED 1000+ in-store on 30–31 August can Spin the Wheel for a chance to win up to 15% off, or other prizes. If you spend AED 1500+ including a Harry Potter fragrance, you will get a spin plus an exclusive Harry Potter gift.
Date: Saturday, 30th August - end of day Sunday, 31st August
